verses.name: 2 Kings 19:25
verses.text: Hast thou not heard long ago how I have done it, and of ancient times that I have formed it? now have I brought it to pass, that thou shouldest be to lay waste fenced cities into ruinous heaps.

verses.name: 2 Kings 19:26
verses.text: Therefore their inhabitants were of small power, they were dismayed and confounded; they were as the grass of the field, and as the green herb, as the grass on the housetops, and as corn blasted before it be grown up.

verses.name: 2 Kings 19:27
verses.text: But I know thy abode, and thy going out, and thy coming in, and thy rage against me.
